name: Lester
delivery_area: Whole South Goa, but call to confirm the area
notes:
The given person isn't a supplier, however, they undertake delivery for everyone in need.. 
Requirements need to be sent on whatsApp, along with contact details(name and adress) and pin the location . 
Orders to be made 24 hours in advance.

name: Grow Mania
delivery_fee: Free only if order is above 350/- rs. If not, max delivery charges are 100/-rs
notes:

Pre ordered delivery only, order 24 hours in advance

name: farm basket
delivery_fee: minimum orders of 200 rs for free delivery.
notes: Notes: kindly place orders in the evening so that fresh fruits and vegetables get delivered at your place the next day..
